meanings.definition: The state or character of being positive
meanings.sent1: Her face lit up with positivity when she received the good news.
meanings.sent2: The team's positivity helped them overcome the challenges they faced.
meanings.sent3: Even the grumpy cat couldn't resist the contagious positivity in the room.
meanings.sent4: The garden bloomed with the vibrant colors of positivity after the rain.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's positivity was like a ray of sunshine on a cloudy day.

meanings.definition: The presence of something desirable or good
meanings.sent1: The party was filled with so much positivity that everyone had a great time.
meanings.sent2: The positivity of the situation made it easier to handle the difficulties.
meanings.sent3: The overflowing basket of puppies was a bundle of pure positivity.
meanings.sent4: The air was filled with the sweet scent of positivity after the successful event.
meanings.sent5: The room was buzzing with an electric energy of positivity.
